reservation.translation[0].definitions[0: an arrangement which you make so that a place in a hotel, restaurant, plane etc is kept for you at a particular time in the future
Customers are advised to make seat reservations well in advance.
reservation.translation[0].definitions[1: a feeling of doubt because you do not agree completely with a plan, idea, or suggestion
We condemn their actions without reservation  (=completely).
I had serious reservations about his appointment as captain.
reservation.translation[0].definitions[2: an area of land in the US kept separate for Native Americans to live on
reservation.translation[0].definitions[3: an area of land where wild animals can live without being hunted
reservation.translation[0].note_box[0].h: – Meaning 1: an arrangement which you make so that a place in a hotel, restaurant, plane etc is kept for you at a particular time in the future
reservation.translation[0].note_box[0].s: We have a reservation for seven o'clock.
We will send you an email to confirm your reservation.
She called the restaurant and cancelled the reservations.
I'd forgotten to make a dinner reservation.
Make sure you have an airline reservation before booking the hotel.
reservation.translation[0].note_box[1].h: – Meaning 2: a feeling of doubt because you do not agree completely with a plan, idea, or suggestion
reservation.translation[0].note_box[1].s: I have reservations about her work.
I did not think it wise to express my reservations.
Despite some reservations, I recommend this book.
They had serious reservations about the plan.
Five of the committee members expressed strong reservations about the product's safety.
We have considerable reservations about the government's economic proposals.
I voted "yes", although I had a few minor reservations
We have major reservations about his ability to do the job.
reservation.translation[1].definitions[0: an arrangement in which a place on a plane, in a hotel, in a restaurant etc is kept for a customer who will arrive later
Every passenger is guaranteed a seat without a reservation.
